The Protectobots:

Hot Spot continued to stand, cursing as he still didn't have a clear 
shot.

A piledriver caught the Autobot in the knee, sending Groove crashing 
to the ground next to Rumble.

Blades laughed, turning through the air to do another strike against 
Soundwave.  He armed his rocket tubes and his 30mm cannons, ready to 
rain down destruction.

Streetwise transformed to his police car mode, driving towards 
Spasstik and Soundwave in an attempt to run them both over.

First Aid, as he'd done before, just watched though he very slowly 
made his way towards Rumble and Groove.
